prompt: read address is not greater than number of entries i.e. the read address is not pointing to an address not in the memory
write address is not greater than number of entries i.e. the write address is not pointing to an address not in the memory
write through violation, where   a read from and a write to thesame address happen in same cycle, does not occur
write after write cases, where writes to the same address happen before a read, does not occur
read after read cases, where read to the same address happen before a write, does not occur
read before write cases, where read to the same address happen before a write, does not occur
max latency between a write and following read is within the specified write-read latency threshold
